metadata.title: CVE-2016-2326 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Integer overflow in the asf_write_packet function in libavformat/asfenc.cin FFmpeg before 2.8.5 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of serviceor possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted PTS (akapresentation timestamp) value in a .mov file.

criterions.comment: libav: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
